the_real_candleford_green.heading: The Real Candleford Green
the_real_candleford_green.about: A conversation with Martin Greenwood, author of The Real Candleford Green. He describes many of the residents of Fringford (Candleford Green) who would have provided inspiration for Flora's characters including Kezia Whitton (Dorcas Lane), the postmistress who gave Flora her first job as an assisant and letter-carrier.

on_the_trail.heading: On The Trail of Flora
on_the_trail.about: A conversation with Jo Smith (author of On The Trail of Flora Thompson) about Flora's life after leaving Fringford (Candleford Green) and the people and places that inspired her life of writing.
